title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Fresh romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef in crispy taco shells with fresh toppings.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake with creamy frosting.
